title: NBA Finals, French Open Faults and Religion of Sports
itunes:title: NBA Finals, French Open Faults and Religion of Sports
description:
Join Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and guest host Damian Sassower as they discuss the NBA finals, backlash toward tennis media during historic moments at the French Open and Tom Brady's Religion of Sports raising funds during a time when venture capital investments are slowing. All that and more on Monday's Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
